name: opentk-mcp
description: Access Dutch parliamentary data including debates, documents, and member information through OpenTK
long_description:
A comprehensive MCP server providing access to Dutch parliamentary data through a standardized interface. Built as a wrapper around Bert Hubert's excellent OpenTK project, this server enables AI assistants to search, retrieve, and analyze parliamentary documents, debates, and member information from the Tweede Kamer.

Features include:
- Smart document relevance analysis using NLP (NEW in v1.0.16)
- Search parliamentary documents with advanced query capabilities
- Access MP information and committee memberships
- Retrieve full document content in various formats
- Track legislative cases and government activities
- Real-time access to parliamentary proceedings
- Find person and party occurrences in documents with fuzzy matching
- Context-efficient document triage with keyword extraction and entity recognition

Perfect for researchers, journalists, political analysts, and anyone interested in Dutch politics and governance.
